card.name: Abbot of Keral Keep
card.text: Prowess When Abbot of Keral Keep enters the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Acolyte of the Inferno
card.text: Renown 1 Whenever Acolyte of the Inferno becomes blocked by a creature, it deals 2 damage to that creature.

card.name: Act of Treason
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Aerial Volley
card.text: Aerial Volley deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures with flying.

card.name: Akroan Jailer
card.text: {2}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Akroan Sergeant
card.text: First strike Renown 1

card.name: Alchemist's Vial
card.text: When Alchemist's Vial enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Alchemist's Vial: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

card.name: Alhammarret's Archive
card.text: If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead. If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead.

card.name: Alhammarret, High Arbiter
card.text: Flying As Alhammarret, High Arbiter enters the battlefield, each opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose the name of a nonland card revealed this way. Your opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name.

card.name: Ampryn Tactician
card.text: When Ampryn Tactician enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Anchor to the AEther
card.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library. Scry 1.

card.name: Angel's Tomb
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Angel's Tomb become a 3/3 white Angel artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

card.name: Animist's Awakening
card.text: Reveal the top X cards of your library. Put all land cards from among them onto the battlefield tapped and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, untap those lands.

card.name: Anointer of Champions
card.text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Archangel of Tithes
card.text: Flying As long as Archangel of Tithes is untapped, creatures can't attack you or a planeswalker you control unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures. As long as Archangel of Tithes is attacking, creatures can't block unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures.

card.name: Artificer's Epiphany
card.text: Draw two cards. If you control no artifacts, discard a card.

card.name: Aspiring Aeronaut
card.text: Flying When Aspiring Aeronaut enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Auramancer
card.text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Avaricious Dragon
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card. At the beginning of your end step, discard your hand.

card.name: Aven Battle Priest
card.text: Flying When Aven Battle Priest enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Battlefield Forge
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Bellows Lizard
card.text: {1}{R}: Bellows Lizard gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Blazing Hellhound
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Blazing Hellhound deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Blessed Spirits
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Blessed Spirits.

card.name: Blightcaster
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may have target creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Blood-Cursed Knight
card.text: As long as you control an enchantment, Blood-Cursed Knight gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.

card.name: Bonded Construct
card.text: Bonded Construct can't attack alone.

card.name: Bone to Ash
card.text: Counter target creature spell. Draw a card.

card.name: Bounding Krasis
card.text: Flash When Bounding Krasis enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap target creature.

card.name: Brawler's Plate
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. Equip {4}

card.name: Calculated Dismissal
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, scry 2.

card.name: Call of the Full Moon
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+2 and has trample. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, sacrifice Call of the Full Moon.

card.name: Caustic Caterpillar
card.text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Caustic Caterpillar: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Caves of Koilos
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Celestial Flare
card.text: Target player sacrifices an attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Chandra's Fury
card.text: Chandra's Fury deals 4 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

card.name: Chandra's Ignition
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each other creature and each opponent.

card.name: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh
card.text: Whenever you cast a red spell, untap Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh. {T}: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh deals 1 damage to target player. If Chandra has dealt 3 or more damage this turn, exile her, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

attr.value: +1: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target player. -2: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target creature. -7: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 6 damage to each opponent. Each player dealt damage this way gets an emblem with 'At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to you.'

card.name: Charging Griffin
card.text: Flying Whenever Charging Griffin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.text: Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Clash of Wills
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.

card.name: Claustrophobia
card.text: Enchant creature When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Cleric of the Forward Order
card.text: When Cleric of the Forward Order enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature you control named Cleric of the Forward Order.

card.name: Conclave Naturalists
card.text: When Conclave Naturalists enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Consul's Lieutenant
card.text: First strike Renown 1 Whenever Consul's Lieutenant attacks, if it's renowned, other attacking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Cruel Revival
card.text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Dark Dabbling
card.text: Regenerate target creature. Draw a card. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, also regenerate each other creature you control.

card.name: Dark Petition
card.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Day's Undoing
card.text: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library, then draws seven cards. If it's your turn, end the turn.

card.name: Deadbridge Shaman
card.text: When Deadbridge Shaman dies, target opponent discards a card.

card.name: Deep-Sea Terror
card.text: Deep-Sea Terror can't attack unless there are seven or more cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Demolish
card.text: Destroy target artifact or land.

card.name: Demonic Pact
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one that hasn't been chosen - - Demonic Pact deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life. - Target opponent discards two cards. - Draw two cards. - You lose the game.

card.name: Despoiler of Souls
card.text: Despoiler of Souls can't block. {B}{B}, Exile two other creature cards from your graveyard: Return Despoiler of Souls from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Disciple of the Ring
card.text: {1}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Choose one - - Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}. - Disciple of the Ring gets +1/+1 until end of turn. - Tap target creature. - Untap target creature.

card.name: Disperse
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Displacement Wave
card.text: Return all nonland permanents with converted mana cost X or less to their owners' hands.

card.name: Dragon Fodder
card.text: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Dreadwaters
card.text: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of lands you control.

card.name: Dwynen's Elite
card.text: When Dwynen's Elite enters the battlefield, if you control another Elf, put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen
card.text: Reach Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking Elf you control.

card.name: Elemental Bond
card.text: Whenever a creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

card.name: Elvish Visionary
card.text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Embermaw Hellion
card.text: Trample If another red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Enlightened Ascetic
card.text: When Enlightened Ascetic enters the battlefield, you may destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Enshrouding Mist
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn. If it's renowned, untap it.

card.name: Enthralling Victor
card.text: When Enthralling Victor enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Erebos's Titan
card.text: As long as your opponents control no creatures, Erebos's Titan has indestructible. Whenever a creature card leaves an opponent's graveyard, you may discard a card. If you do, return Erebos's Titan from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Evolutionary Leap
card.text: {G}, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Exquisite Firecraft
card.text: Exquisite Firecraft deals 4 damage to target creature or player. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Exquisite Firecraft can't be countered by spells or abilities.

card.text: When Eyeblight Assassin enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Fetid Imp
card.text: Flying {B}: Fetid Imp gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Fiery Conclusion

card.name: Fiery Impulse
card.text: Fiery Impulse deals 2 damage to target creature. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Fiery Impulse deals 3 damage to that creature instead.

card.name: Firefiend Elemental
card.text: Haste Renown 1

card.text: Ramroller attacks each turn if able. Ramroller gets +2/+0 as long as you control another artifact.

card.name: Ravaging Blaze
card.text: Ravaging Blaze deals X damage to target creature. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Ravaging Blaze also deals X damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Read the Bones
card.text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Reave Soul
card.text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.

card.name: Reclaim
card.text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Reclusive Artificer
card.text: Haste When Reclusive Artificer enters the battlefield, you may have it deal damage to target creature equal to the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: Relic Seeker
card.text: Renown 1 When Relic Seeker becomes renowned, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Returned Centaur
card.text: When Returned Centaur enters the battlefield, target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Revenant
card.text: Flying Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Rhox Maulers
card.text: Trample Renown 2

card.name: Rogue's Passage
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Runed Servitor
card.text: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

card.name: Scab-Clan Berserker
card.text: Haste Renown 1 Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, if Scab-Clan Berserker is renowned, Scab-Clan Berserker deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Scrapskin Drake
card.text: Flying Scrapskin Drake can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Screeching Skaab
card.text: When Screeching Skaab enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Seismic Elemental
card.text: When Seismic Elemental enters the battlefield, creatures without flying can't block this turn.

card.name: Send to Sleep
card.text: Tap up to two target creatures. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.

card.name: Sentinel of the Eternal Watch
card.text: Vigilance At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.

card.name: Separatist Voidmage
card.text: When Separatist Voidmage enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Shadows of the Past
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, scry 1. {4}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Activate this ability only if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Shaman of the Pack
card.text: When Shaman of the Pack enters the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Elves you control.

card.name: Shambling Ghoul
card.text: Shambling Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Shivan Reef
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Sigil of Valor
card.text: Whenever equipped creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control. Equip {1}

card.name: Sigil of the Empty Throne
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Sigiled Starfish
card.text: {T}: Scry 1.

card.name: Skaab Goliath
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Skaab Goliath, exile two creature cards from your graveyard. Trample

card.name: Smash to Smithereens
card.text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.

card.name: Somberwald Alpha
card.text: Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {1}{G}: Target creature you control gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Soulblade Djinn
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Sphinx's Tutelage
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, target opponent puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If they're both nonland cards that share a color, repeat this process. {5}{U}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Stalwart Aven
card.text: Flying Renown 1

card.name: Starfield of Nyx
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield. As long as you control five or more enchantments, each other non-Aura enchantment you control is a creature in addition to its other types and has base power and base toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Stratus Walk
card.text: Enchant creature When Stratus Walk enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has flying. Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Subterranean Scout
card.text: When Subterranean Scout enters the battlefield, target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Suppression Bonds
card.text: Enchant nonland permanent Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

card.name: Swift Reckoning
card.text: Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you may cast Swift Reckoning as though it had flash. Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Sword of the Animist
Sylvan Messenger
card.text: Trample When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Tainted Remedy
card.text: If an opponent would gain life, that player loses that much life instead.

card.name: Talent of the Telepath
card.text: Target opponent reveals the top seven cards of his or her library. You may cast an instant or sorcery card from among them without paying its mana cost. Then that player puts the rest into his or her graveyard. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you may cast up to two revealed instant and/or sorcery cards instead of one.

card.name: The Great Aurora
card.text: Each player shuffles all cards from his or her hand and all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then draws that many cards. Each player may put any number of land cards from his or her hand onto the battlefield. Exile The Great Aurora.

card.name: Thopter Engineer
card.text: When Thopter Engineer enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Artifact creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Thopter Spy Network
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Thornbow Archer
card.text: Whenever Thornbow Archer attacks, each opponent who doesn't control an Elf loses 1 life.

card.name: Throwing Knife
Thunderclap Wyvern
card.text: Flash Flying Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

card.name: Timberpack Wolf
card.text: Timberpack Wolf gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control named Timberpack Wolf.

card.name: Titan's Strength
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Scry 1.

card.name: Titanic Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Topan Freeblade
card.text: Vigilance Renown 1

card.name: Tormented Thoughts
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Tormented Thoughts, sacrifice a creature. Target player discards a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

card.name: Totem-Guide Hartebeest
card.text: When Totem-Guide Hartebeest enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Touch of Moonglove
card.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Whenever a creature dealt damage by that creature dies this turn, its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Tower Geist
card.text: Flying When Tower Geist enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Tragic Arrogance
card.text: For each player, you choose from among the permanents that player controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker. Then each player sacrifices all other nonland permanents he or she controls.

card.name: Turn to Frog
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.

card.name: Undead Servant
card.text: When Undead Servant enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield for each card named Undead Servant in your graveyard.

card.name: Undercity Troll

card.name: Unholy Hunger
card.text: Destroy target creature. Spell mastery - If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Valor in Akros
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Equip {1}

card.name: Vine Snare
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with power 4 or less.

card.name: Volcanic Rambler
card.text: {2}{R}: Volcanic Rambler deals 1 damage to target player.

card.text: Flying Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

card.text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Watercourser
card.text: {U}: Watercourser gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Whirler Rogue

card.name: Wild Instincts
card.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Willbreaker
card.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, gain control of that creature for as long as you control Willbreaker.

card.name: Woodland Bellower
card.text: When Woodland Bellower enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a nonlegendary green creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Yavimaya Coast
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Yeva's Forcemage
card.text: When Yeva's Forcemage enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Zendikar Incarnate
card.text: Zendikar Incarnate's power is equal to the number of lands you control.

card.name: Zendikar's Roil
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a 2/2 green Elemental creature token onto the battlefield.
